about_the_game:
The Clown's Forest 2: Waking Shadows is the sequel to The Clown's Forest and will contain spoilers for the first game.

STORY
18-year-old Michael Longhurst was found by 25-year-old James Barlow, wandering the streets in the early hours of June 21st. Battered and Bruised, James suggested taking Michael to the hospital, which he had refused. Taking Michael back to his place for him to rest and be treated, Michael told James everything that had happened. James, while sceptical, believed Michael, and offered to go with him back to Hartown Park to try and find the Killer.

Michael was hesitant to return, but with his anger, he wanted to kill the Clown and avenge his friends. They return to the park the following evening, on June 22nd. What is about to happen, will turn both their lives upside down.

Gameplay Features:

Puzzles - Puzzles return from the base game with James and Michael at the helm. Can they use their wits to escape?

Highly Detailed Maps - Highly detailed maps return with no reused locations!

Compelling Cast of Characters - Characters have been written to feel alive and very realistic!

Chase Sequences - Blitzo doesn't take kindly to visitors, and due to the events of the base game, he is even more dangerous.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features Pixel Art depicting flesh and blood. And also features detailed text-based death scenes.

short_description: Michael Longhurst had just survived the terrible ordeal in Hartown Park. But finds himself returning to the park a day later, accompanied by James Barlow, a 25-year-old Medical Student. Together they relive the horrors that happened the previous night.
